DOC.brief_title: Monoclonal Antibody Therapy Docetaxel Treating Women With Metastatic Recurrent Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine toxicity safety profile doxorubicin-monoclonal antibody BR96 immunoconjugate ( SGN-15 ) docetaxel woman metastatic recurrent breast cancer . - Determine clinical response rate duration response patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive doxorubicin-monoclonal antibody BR96 immunoconjugate ( SGN-15 ) IV 2 hour docetaxel IV 30 minute day 1 week 1-6 . Treatment repeat every 8 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 4 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 45 patient accrue study within 18-24 month .
